title: Grey Matter: A Dark Short Story
description: Small time crook Jase Rastich wakes to find himself in the dungeon of a medieval castle. Put to trial, he is accused of crimes he didn’t commit. The creepy and mysterious Grey is tasked with getting him to confess. The methods he uses turn out to be a punishment much more cruel than the crimes Rastich did commit. Or aren’t they? WARNING: Contains descriptions of violence, torture and abuse.
author: P.W. Thorin
